name: Federal Plaza
description: Massive government plaza with perfect granite ledges. Heavily skated in videos but security is aggressive.
history: Featured in countless skate videos since the 90s. Security enforcement has increased over the years.
bestTimes: Weekends and after-hours when security is lighter.
transitDirections: 4/5/6 to Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall, J/Z to Chambers.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include granite ledges, flat ground, stairs, gaps. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Manhattan skate scene in Civic Center. Featured in countless skate videos since the 90s. Security enforcement has increased over the years.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 4/5/6 to Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall, J/Z to Chambers.. Weekends and after-hours when security is lighter.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
